title: Olympics Plugin Configuration
description: Configuration schema for the enhanced Olympics plugin with live data, medals, events, and results

enabled.description: Enable or disable the Olympics plugin

display_duration.description: How long to display the plugin in seconds (switch mode)

timezone.description: Timezone for event times (IANA format, e.g., 'America/New_York')

update_interval.description: How often to fetch fresh data in seconds (default: 5 minutes)

section_duration.description: How long to show each section (medals, events, results) in switch mode

top_countries_count.description: Number of top countries to display by medal count

additional_countries.description: Country codes to always show (ISO 3166-1 alpha-3, e.g., ['USA', 'CAN'])

rival_countries.description: Rival countries for medal race comparison

sport_filters.description: Filter events to specific sports (empty = all sports)

upcoming_events_count.description: Maximum number of upcoming events to display

recent_results_count.description: Maximum number of recent results to display

live_alerts_enabled.description: Enable priority alerts for live medal events

medal_race_enabled.description: Enable medal race comparison between countries

notifications_enabled.description: Enable webhook notifications for medal wins, records, and live finals

favorite_countries.description: Countries to receive notifications for (ISO 3166-1 alpha-3, e.g., ['USA', 'CAN'])

url.description: Webhook URL to send notifications to

vegas_mode.description: Vegas display mode: scroll (continuous), fixed (static block), static (pauses scroll)

text_color.description: RGB color for text [R, G, B] (default: white)

high_performance_transitions.description: Use high-performance transitions (120 FPS) instead of standard (30 FPS)
